title: Does ELO even matter anymore?
body:
Greetings, ever since the start of this season, almost every single normal game i have played, there has ALWAYS been at least 4 plats or diamonds.
Now, that would be fine, if i play i on that level, but i don't i'm an unranked high silver from last season, i have even had games where it was 4 unranked and a gold on 3 plats and a diamond.
Is the ELO system just broken or something? this is just ridiculous.

replies.body: Sure, the plat and diamond players might be better than you _If they're playing the champions they normally play in ranked._ If they're playing normals though, chances are they're playing off roles, champions they never play, messing around with friends etc. so you're likely more evenly matched than you think

normals use a different MMR, so you could have a diamond level mmr in normals OR the more likely as the diamond players probs play less normals, their mmr is much lower OR/AND when they play normals they just do silly things, weird comps, care less, relax more and don't win as often.

see, i would believe that if it were once in every 5 or 10 games or something, but the fact its every single one, and almost always mostly on the other team..i mean, come on, at times the MMR differance between 2 teams has been upwards of 1k

We people in Plat/Diamond troll a lot in normals, if you're high silver it's not that unusual for people in high ranked Elo to be in your games, especially considering how small our region is.

I had the same thing happened to me in normal draft on NA when I was in high Silver - got matched up with plats and diamonds all the time.
^ this, i'm diamond, when i play normals i play to win, but im happy to play something i never touch or i'll do troll comps etc.
rank doesn't matter in norms anyway
